title: Youngrebel
author: Youngrebel
content: In life you must learn, from Pre-Nursary to College (Tertiary level) and when you have learned, you removed the  "L" from Learn and use the remaining word "Earn". Every learner aim to earn at the end of his learning. I am still learning in the forum. Where did you earn from bitcoin? It is the investment of bitcoin, though there are others too. When you invest in bitcoin and hopefully you must earn from it in the long run. I am on the DCA investment of bitcoin and my investment is for long term and not short term so I can remove the L from the learning process and keep the E in the earning process.I have invested more than $600. And these are some of my investment in this year.

comments.author: Alone055
comments.body: Good strategy. Many people underestimate the power of doing DCA, but if they understand that a small amount invested in Bitcoin every week or every month might make them some good profit in the future, and by good profit, I mean something reasonable and not peanuts. It's even more effective if you continue to do that regardless of the price of the coin because many people stop buying when they see the price has gone up. I know that you can get more value for the same amount if the price is lower, but that shouldn't stop you from accumulating more over time.For someone who hasn't started yet but plans to do so, the best time to start doing DCA is the end of the bull market and the beginning of the bear market. If you start buying at that point and buy all through the bear market and also through the recovery phase after that, you are going to have amazing profits by the time the next bull run approaches.That being said, something like that is only possible if you have a stable source of income and the capacity to have money allocated for this purpose. Using money intended for something else or borrowing to make investments is a bad idea.

comments.body: Great start mate. You are doing the right thing, and with patience and determination all throughout the process, you will end up earning and benefiting a lot from bitcoin.
